title: xdg-open: no method available for opening 'https://status-desktop.featureupvote.com/'
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Clicked on a link, in a chat, system default browser does not open

## Steps to reproduce

- click url in chat
- pop up appears to choose system vs status browser
- select system default browser, tick box to remember

#### Expected behavior

Default system browser opens link (firefox)

#### Actual behavior

- No browser opens
- 
### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: 0.8.0
- Operating System: Linux Fedora

Logs:

```
DBG 2022-12-07 14:36:41.163+11:00 NewBE_callPrivateRPC                       topics="rpc" tid=2727450 file=core.nim:20 rpc_method=wakuext_emojiReactionsByChatID
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
XPCOMGlueLoad error for file /usr/lib64/firefox/libmozgtk.so:
/lib64/libgio-2.0.so.0: undefined symbol: g_module_open_full
Couldn't load XPCOM.
sed: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by sed)
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: x-www-browser: command not found
XPCOMGlueLoad error for file /usr/lib64/firefox/libmozgtk.so:
/lib64/libgio-2.0.so.0: undefined symbol: g_module_open_full
Couldn't load XPCOM.
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: iceweasel: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: seamonkey: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: mozilla: command not found
epiphany: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by /lib64/libgio-2.0.so.0)
epiphany: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/liblzma.so.5: version `XZ_5.2' not found (required by /lib64/libarchive.so.13)
epiphany: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by /lib64/libmount.so.1)
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: konqueror: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: chromium: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: chromium-browser: command not found
mkdir: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by mkdir)
/usr/bin/google-chrome: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by /lib64/libgio-2.0.so.0)
/usr/bin/google-chrome: /tmp/.mount_Status60edVp/usr/lib/libselinux.so.1: no version information available (required by /lib64/libmount.so.1)
/usr/bin/google-chrome: symbol lookup error: /lib64/libgio-2.0.so.0: undefined symbol: g_module_open_full
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: www-browser: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: links2: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: elinks: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: links: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: lynx: command not found
/usr/bin/xdg-open: line 881: w3m: command not found
xdg-open: no method available for opening 'https://status-desktop.featureupvote.com/'

```

do note that I open the status desktop app image from my regular terminal.

In another terminal window, I can confirm `xdg-open` works as expected:


```                                                                                                   
▶ xdg-open 'https://status-desktop.featureupvote.com/'                                         
# opens url in firefox as expected
▶ which xdg-open
/usr/bin/xdg-open
```

Maybe some env var did not get loaded in the context? here's the result of my `env` :

```

SSH_AUTH_SOCK=/tmp/ssh-XXXXXXICUuLc/agent.7511

INVOCATION_ID=223db5c9722f4dde801afe4040ba597d
LESSOPEN=||/usr/bin/lesspipe.sh %s
QT_IM_MODULE=ibus

HOSTNAME=xps-franck

HISTSIZE=50000
XDG_MENU_PREFIX=gnome-
HOME=/home/fryorcraken
DBUS_SESSION_BUS_ADDRESS=unix:path=/run/user/1000/bus
XDG_DATA_DIRS=/home/fryorcraken/.local/share/flatpak/exports/share:/var/lib/flatpak/exports/share:/usr/local/share/:/usr/share/:/var/lib/snapd/desktop
VTE_VERSION=7001

GNOME_SETUP_DISPLAY=:1

LOGNAME=fryorcraken
PATH=/home/fryorcraken/.local/share/pnpm:/home/fryorcraken/.yarn/bin:/home/fryorcraken/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/.bin:/home/fryorcraken/.nvm/versions/node/v16.17.0/bin:/home/froyer/.local/share/gem/ruby/3.0.0/bin:/home/fryorcraken/.node_modules/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/home/fryorcraken/.local/bin:/home/fryorcraken/.cargo/bin:/home/fryorcraken/.cargo/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/var/lib/snapd/snap/bin:/home/fryorcraken/go/bin:/home/fryorcraken/.rvm/bin
XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/run/user/1000
XMODIFIERS=@im=ibus

COLORTERM=truecolor

GDMSESSION=gnome
TERM=xterm-256color
XAUTHORITY=/run/user/1000/.mutter-Xwaylandauth.I471V1
LS_COLORS=di=34;40:ln=35;40:so=32;40:pi=33;40:ex=31;40:bd=34;46:cd=34;43:su=0;41:sg=0;46:tw=0;42:ow=0;43:
ZSH=/home/fryorcraken/.oh-my-zsh
```

It's a bug with the AppImage :/
